title: So much lag lately...
body: Okahy so last week i had a ping of 25 now it ranges 200-812 then auto dcs me.  Nothing about my internet has changed and even my friends notice their ping rising for no reason at all.  Why is this game becoming more and more unplayable with every patch...

replies.body: With those kinds of ping spikes it could be due to one of two different things. Possibly something is happening during those games that is causing your network's connection to become unstable. Go through [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and we can see if the main problem lies there.
